# mythicbeasts_user_data (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = ">= 1.3.0"

  required_providers {
    mythicbeasts = {
      source = "paultibbetts/mythicbeasts"
    }
  }
}

resource "mythicbeasts_user_data" "example" {
  name = "example-apache"
  data = "#cloud-config\n\npackages:\n  - apache2\n\n"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `data` (String) User data snippet
- `name` (String) User data name

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) User data identifier
- `size` (Number) User data size (in bytes)
